title: Can anyone identify these chunky fonts?
tags: Can anyone identify these chunky fonts?
author: NeonPurple

comments.content:
1. probably custom  
2. based on some Transformers movie fan font  
3. probably custom  
4. probably not available as a font.

1. REID SPEED: [Slant](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824202241/http:/www.dafont.com/fr/slant.font) customized  
2. ARMORED: [Transrobotics](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824202241/http:/www.dafont.com/sf-transrobotics.font) (confirmed as "Transrobotica" [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824202241/http:/motionworks.net/breakdowns-august-2010))  
3. TRAJIKK: don't know this one, may be customized from some obscur techy freebie. [SciFi section at DaFont](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824202241/http:/www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=303) ( [Sea Dog 2001](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824202241/http:/www.dafont.com/fr/sea-dog2001.font)...) is full of this kind of font.
Thank you very much Ryuk, youre a god

ok i am sorry i got it  
Transbotics for ARMORED and Slant for REID.  
Thanks Again :)
